description: Continuous synchronization between Heimdall instances using append-only change logs, TLS-secured replication, and merge rules.
steps: Design change-log schema and per-record metadata (version vector, origin, tombstone).
Implement change-log writer and local storage.
Implement sync agent (push/pull) with TLS and OIDC auth.
Implement merge resolver and per-type rules.
Add tests for partitions and reconciliation.
